Welcome to the lab *"Voice to Text"* 

![](/images/logo.png){width="60%"}


In this lab you will learn how to use [OpenAI's Whisper API](https://platform.openai.com/docs/guides/speech-to-text) to transcribe audio into whatever language the audio is in.

::: {.callout-important}
Make sure you meet all the [requirements](/requirements.qmd) and have read the lecture [slides](/slide.qmd) before you start with the [assignments](/assignments.qmd) 
:::

What you will learn in this lab:

- How to create mp3 data from text
- How to use Whisper to convert audio data into text data
- Create a workflow to prepare multiple audio files at once
- Make use of GPT to correct the text
